oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Larry Gatlin Live at the Westchester Theatre - 1979-11-24 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from the Westchester Theatre live show. The tape features a live performance of Larry Gatlin (musician) and the Gatlin Brothers (musical group). The Lone Star Café show is presented by Mort Cooperman, Bill McGivney and the WHN radio network. The recording of Larry Gatlin is from November 24, 1979. The tape is part one of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Larry Gatlin; Gatlin Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Lee Arnold introduces members of WHN, Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers Band -- (02:07) Broken Lady (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (06:45) I Don't Wanna Cry (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (09:11) Help Me (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (12:57) I Just Can't Get Her Out of My Mind (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (15:12) Statues Without Hearts (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (18:17) Larry Gatlin introduces the Gatlin Brothers Band, and Larry Gatlin discusses alcohol -- (23:31) Love is Just a Game (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (26:48) Night Time Magic (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (29:30) Larry Gatlin reflects on when he first moved to Nashville, and Larry disrupts the story to talk to Randy Walker -- (31:18) The Heart (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (34:58) Larry Gatlin reflects on a man he recently met -- (36:32) Penny Annie (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (41:49) Larry Gatlin calls his songs his children -- (44:12) The Songwriter's Trilogy (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (50:42) Larry Gatlin introduces the members of the Gatlin Brothers Band -- (52:26) When I Fall (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (56:20) Canadian Sunset (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (57:30) Larry Gatlin jokes about the title of ""Canadian Sunset"" and praises Columbia Records -- (58:55) I've Done Enough Dyin' Today (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers) -- (1:02:50) All the Gold in California (Larry Gatlin and the Gatlin Brothers)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gatlin Brothers; Gatlin, Larry; Gatlin, Larry, 1948-;
